channel.title: Need help with fixing barrage!
channel.description:
My barrage on my server works great on other ppl in the wilderness, but when it comes to NPC's it doesn't do nothing, I was just wondering if someone could post the code for barrage, it would be greatly appreciated!
[code][client-1-name]: npcindex: 53 magicID: 12891 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-name]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000[/code]

item.title: Need help with fixing barrage!
item.dc:creator: @inuyasha_12345 inuyasha 12345
item.description:
@inuyasha_12345 wrote:

My barrage on my server works great on other ppl in the wilderness, but when it comes to NPC’s it doesn’t do nothing, I was just wondering if someone could post the code for barrage, it would be greatly appreciated!

[client-1-name]: npcindex: 53 magicID: 12891 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-name]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000
